page.title: 17Health in Alresford
page.content: Alresford has no medical facilities of its own, there being neither a dentists surgery, doctors surgery nor a pharmacy in the village. Residents have to register with a doctor in Wivenhoe, Brightlingsea or Colchester, and must travel to these places, or call a doctor out from them, even in an emergency.This has worried some people who have fought to get a doctor's surgery in the village, but their pleas have been turned down.It is generally considered that since Wivenhoe is so near, there is no need for Alresford to have its own doctor. There is, however, a local Health Visitor, who comes to the village and talks and advises such people as the Young Wives; a group of mums with pre-school age children who meet fortnightly.
